title: How to Make Curried Eggs on Rice

steps.headline: Put sour cream, onions, mayonnaise in the saucepan.
Turn on the stove, and stir until it starts to bubble.
Add curry and simmer gently until sauce starts to turn yellow.
Stir frequently while sauce is cooking.
Put rice in cake pan and spread evenly using spatula.
Slice eggs on top of the rice.
steps.description: Do not slice ahead of time, because the eggs would fall apart.

steps.headline: Add olives.
steps.description: (If you happen to have a non-olive eater in the household, make like a pizza and only do half).

steps.headline: Pour sauce onto dish and spread evenly.
Bake at about 350 degrees for about 20 minutes.

text: Sauce Put sour cream, onions, mayonnaise in the saucepan.  Turn on the stove, and stir until it starts to bubble.  Add curry and simmer gently until sauce starts to turn yellow.  Stir frequently while sauce is cooking.  Curried Eggs on Rice Put rice in cake pan and spread evenly using spatula.  Slice eggs on top of the rice. Do not slice ahead of time, because the eggs would fall apart. Add olives. (If you happen to have a non-olive eater in the household, make like a pizza and only do half). Pour sauce onto dish and spread evenly.  Bake at about 350 degrees for about 20 minutes.
